steps.title: Open your Internet browser of choice.
steps.content: Open your Internet browser of choice.

steps.title: Sign in with your username and password credentials if you aren't already signed in.
steps.content: Sign in with your username and password credentials if you aren't already signed in.

steps.title: Click the link "Go to Inbox" which is strategically positioned underneath "Hotmail Highlights" in about the center of the resulting webpage.
steps.content: Click the link "Go to Inbox" which is strategically positioned underneath "Hotmail Highlights" in about the center of the resulting webpage.

steps.title: Locate the listing of messages you have on the screen.
steps.content: Locate the listing of messages you have on the screen. Most of the way over to the left on top of the folders, you'll see a search box.

steps.title: Use the search box described in the previous step.
steps.content: Use the search box described in the previous step.

steps.title: Type in whatever search term you want to use, or you can type in a to-address, or a contact name.
steps.content: Type in whatever search term you want to use, or you can type in a to-address, or a contact name. one of several other terms. You can also type in a Bing web search term, to further search the web, if you don't find the intended message in Hotmail/your Windows Live account.

steps.title: Scroll through the list, until you've found your specific search term.
steps.content: Scroll through the list, until you've found your specific search term.

steps.title: Press ↵ Enter to begin your search.
steps.content: Press ↵ Enter to begin your search.

steps.title: Allow a few seconds for Hotmail to search your Inbox, as well as all your other folders for messages with the intended search setting-terms displayed in the box.
steps.content: Allow a few seconds for Hotmail to search your Inbox, as well as all your other folders for messages with the intended search setting-terms displayed in the box.

steps.title: Look over the list, to see what results you'll need to grab or take action with.
steps.content: Look over the list, to see what results you'll need to grab or take action with.
